languages.text:
"- ...большая честь!
- Да, но... это повышение — перевод всего отряда в личную охрану Дитя.
- Господь-Император! Ну да ты парень крепкий, может, и выдержишь хотя бы несколько циклов.
- Другие бывали и покрепче. Что толку, если мозги набекрень становятся? Я могу вырвать себе глаза, как Амос. В лучшем случае — сразу отдать концы, как тот мелкий засранец-служка, таскавший у нас лхо...
- А с ним-то что?
- Выбросился из разгерметизированного отсека из-за каких-то голосов.
- Ладно, Хранитель Фелек сказал, что отряд будет служить у Дитя недолго. Даже дал нам поблажку.
- Не то что этот рыбогла...
- Тихо ты! Услышит еще.
- ... ну ты понял. Сегодня чуть головы нам не взорвал из-за того, что кто-то забыл перепроверить пищеблок.
- За десять лет ни одного постороннего не впустили, а Хранитель Теобальд все трясется. То-то визгу будет, если он узнает, что господин Фелек разрешил нам не перепроверять ангар с последнего прилета господина Винтерскейла.
- Помилуй Трон, лучше бы держаться подальше от господских разборок. Некоторые приказы Хранителя Фелека мне вообще непонятны: последний раз он велел отключить связь с Райкадом Минорис на несколько циклов.
- Это еще зачем?
- Похоже, отпрыск Винтерскейла утомил его своими визитами.
- Ну, господину Фелеку завсегда приятно помочь.
- Точно. Пусть высокородные сами между собой разбираются, кто кого утомил..."

traits.locale_text:
"- …большая честь!
- Да, но… это повышение — перевод всего отряда в личную охрану Дитя.
- Господь-Император! Ну да ты парень крепкий, может, и выдержишь хотя бы несколько циклов.

- Точно. Пусть высокородные сами между собой разбираются, кто кого утомил…"

languages.text:
"- ...tremendous honour!
- Yes, but... this promotion will transfer the entire squad to the Child's personal guard.
- By the God-Emperor! Well, you are a strapping lad, you will probably make it for a cycle or three.
- It has worn down better men than me. What even is the point if your brains turn into mush? I may rip out my eyes like Amos did. At best, I'll just go bonkers like that little shit stain that kept stealing our lho...
- Oh? What happened to that one?
- Threw himself out of a depressurised chamber because some voices told him to.
- Calm down. Keeper Felek said the squad will not have to serve the Child for long. He even gave us a little leeway.
- Unlike that fish-eyed...
- Be quiet! He might hear you.
- Well, you know what I mean. He almost busted our heads because someone forgot to check the catering unit.
- We haven't let in a single outsider in over ten years, but Keeper Theobald keeps finding things to fret over. Imagine the shrieking if he finds out Keeper Felek didn't make us inspect the hangar after Lord Winterscale's most recent visit.
- Throne forbid! I try to steer clear of the squabbles among the highborn. Some of Keeper Felek's orders make little sense, like the last time he commanded that we cut off communications with Rykad Minoris for a while.
- Why would he do that?
- It looks like he grew tired of the Winterscale scion's visits.
- Well, it's always a pleasure to aid Keeper Felek.
- That's right. If the highborn have grown tired of each other, let them deal with it..."

traits.locale_text:
"- …tremendous honour!
- Yes, but… this promotion is going to transfer the entire squad to the Child's personal guard.
- By the God-Emperor! Well, you are a strapping lad, you will probably make it for a cycle or three.
- It wore down better men than me. What is even the point if your brains turn into mush? I may rip out my eyes like Amos did. At best, just go bonkers like that little shit stain that kept stealing our lho…
- Oh? What happened to that one?
- Threw himself out of a depressurized chamber because some voices told him to.
- All right. Warden Felek said the squad will not have to serve the Child for long. He even gave us a little leeway.
- Unlike that fish-eyed…
- Be quiet! He may hear you.
- Well, you know what I mean. He almost busted our heads because someone forgot to check the catering unit.
- We haven't let in a single outsider in over ten years, but Warden Theobald keeps fretting over things. Imagine the shrieking if he finds out master Felek allowed us not to inspect the hanger after Lord Winterscale's most recent visit.
- Throne forbid! I try to steer clear of the squabbles among the highborn. Some of the Warden Felek's orders make little sense, like the last time he commanded to cut off the communications with Rykad Minoris for a few cycles.
- Why would he do that?
- It looks like grew tired of the Winterscale scion's visits.
- Well, it is always a pleasure to aid master Felek.
- That's right. Let the highborn deal with who has grown tired of who…"

languages.text:
«- ¡... un tremendo honor!
- Sí, pero con este ascenso, todo el escuadrón acabará formando parte de la guardia personal de la Niña.
- ¡Por el Dios Emperador! Bueno, eres fuerte, seguramente aguantarás varios ciclos.
- Hombres mejores que yo han acabado destrozados por su culpa. ¿Qué sentido tiene si acaba haciéndote el cerebro papilla? Puede que me arranque los ojos como hizo Amos. En el mejor de los casos, me volveré majareta como ese mierdecilla que no paraba de robarnos el lho...
- Hala, ¿qué ha sido de ese tipo?
- Se lanzó desde una cámara despresurizada porque unas voces le dijeron que lo hiciera.
- Calma. El guardián Felek dijo que el escuadrón no tendrá que servir a la Niña durante un tiempo. Hasta nos ha dado un poco de margen.
- No como ese ojos de pez...
- ¡Baja la voz! Podría oírte.
- Ya sabes a qué me refiero. Casi nos aplasta la cabeza porque alguien olvidó revisar la unidad de suministros.
- Llevamos diez años sin dejar entrar ni a un solo forastero, pero el guardián Theobald sigue encontrando cosas por las que preocuparse. Imagina cómo se pondría si se enterase de que el guardián Felek no nos hizo inspeccionar el hangar después de la última visita del Lord Winterscale.
- ¡Que el Trono no lo quiera! Por mi parte, intento mantenerme al margen de las disputas entre los nobles. Algunas de las órdenes del guardián Felek no tienen ningún sentido, como aquella vez que nos mandó cortar las comunicaciones realizadas con Rykad Minoris durante cierto tiempo.
- ¿Para qué querría que hiciéramos eso?
- Creo que se hartó de que lo visitara el descendiente de los Winterscale.
- Bueno, siempre es un placer ayudar al guardián Felek.
- Es verdad. Si los nobles se llevan mal, es cosa de ellos...».

traits.locale_text:
«- ¡...un completo horror!
- Sí, pero con este ascenso, todo el escuadrón acabará formando parte de la guardia personal de la niña.
- ¡Por el Dios Emperador! Bueno, eres fuerte, seguramente aguantarás varios ciclos.
- Hombres mejores que yo han acabado destrozados por su culpa. ¿Qué sentido tiene si acaba haciéndote el cerebro papilla? Puede que me arranque los ojos como hizo Amos. En el mejor de los casos, me volveré majareta como ese mierdecilla que no paraba de robarnos el lho...
- Hala, ¿qué ha sido de ese tipo?
- Se lanzó desde una cámara despresurizada porque unas voces le dijeron que lo hiciera.
- Vaya. El guardián Felek dijo que el escuadrón no tendrá que servir a la niña durante un tiempo. Hasta nos ha dado un poco de margen.
- No como ese ojos de pez...
- ¡Baja la voz! Podría oírte.
- Ya sabes a qué me refiero. Casi nos aplasta la cabeza porque alguien olvidó revisar la unidad de suministros.
- Llevamos diez años sin dejar entrar ni a un solo forastero, pero el guardián Theobald sigue encontrando cosas por las que preocuparse. Imagina cómo se pondría si se enterase de que el guardián Felek no nos hizo inspeccionar el hangar después de la última visita del Lord Winterscale.
- ¡Que el Trono no lo quiera! Por mi parte, intento mantenerme al margen de las disputas entre los nobles. Algunas de las órdenes del guardián Felek no tienen ningún sentido, como aquella vez que nos mandó contar las comunicaciones realizadas con Rykad Minoris durante cierto tiempo.
- ¿Para qué querría que hiciéramos eso?
- Creo que se hartó de que lo visitara el descendiente de los Winterscale.
- Bueno, siempre es un placer ayudar al guardián Felek.
- Es verdad. Si los nobles se llevan mal, es cosa de ellos...».

languages.text:
"- ... gewaltige Ehre!
- Ja, aber ... durch diese Beförderung wird der gesamte Trupp zur persönlichen Leibgarde des Kindes versetzt.
- Beim Gottimperator! Nun, Ihr seid ein strammer junger Bursche, Ihr werdet vermutlich ein, zwei Zyklen lang überleben, vielleicht sogar drei.
- Es hat schon bessere Männer als mich zerschlissen. Welchen Sinn hat es überhaupt, wenn Eure Gehirne zu Brei verkommen? Vielleicht reiße ich mir die Augen heraus, wie Amos es getan hat. Bestenfalls werde ich einfach verrückt wie dieser kleine Scheißkerl, der immer unseren Lho gestohlen hat ...
- Oh? Was ist denn mit ihm geschehen?
- Er hat sich aus einer Druckkammer geworfen, weil es ihm irgendwelche Stimmen befohlen haben.
- Beruhigt Euch. Hüter Felek sagte, der Truppe werde dem Kind nicht lange dienen müssen. Er hat uns sogar ein wenig Spielraum gegeben.
- Im Gegensatz zu diesem fischäugigen ...
- Ruhe! Er könnte Euch hören.
- Nun ja, Ihr wisst, was ich meine. Er hätte uns fast die Köpfe eingeschlagen, weil jemand vergessen hat, die Catering-Einheit zu überprüfen.
- Wir haben seit über zehn Jahren keinen einzigen Außenseiter eingelassen, doch Hüter Theobald findet immer wieder Grund zur Klage. Stellt Euch nur sein Geschrei vor, wenn er erfährt, dass Hüter Felek uns nach Lord Winterzunders letztem Besuch den Hänger nicht hat inspizieren lassen.
- Der Thron bewahre! Ich versuche, mich von den Streitigkeiten unter den Hochwohlgeborenen fernzuhalten. Manche von Hüter Feleks Befehlen sind wenig sinnvoll. Beispielsweise, als er das letzte Mal befohlen hat, die Kommunikation mit Rykad Minoris eine Weile einzustellen.
- Warum sollte er das tun?
- Er war der Besuche des Winterzunder-Sprösslings wohl überdrüssig.
- Nun, es ist immer eine Freude, Hüter Felek zu helfen.
- Wohl wahr. Wenn die Hochwohlgeborenen einander leid sind, sollen sie das selbst ausfechten ..."

- Well, you know what I mean. He almost busted our heads because someone forgot to check the catering unit.
- We haven't let in a single outsider in over ten years, but Keeper Theobald keeps finding things to fret over. Imagine the shrieking if he finds out Keeper Felek didn't make us inspect the hangar after Lord Winterscale's most recent visit.
- Throne forbid! I try to steer clear of the squabbles among the highborn. Some of Keeper Felek's orders make little sense, like the last time he commanded that we cut off communications with Rykad Minoris for a while.
- Why would he do that?
- It looks like he grew tired of the Winterscale scion's visits.
- Well, it's always a pleasure to aid Keeper Felek.
- That's right. If the highborn have grown tired of each other, let them deal with it..."

traits.locale_text:
"- ... gewaltige Ehre!
- Ja, aber ... durch diese Beförderung wird der gesamte Trupp zur persönlichen Leibgarde des Kindes versetzt.
- Beim Gottimperator! Nun, Ihr seid ein strammer junger Bursche, Ihr werdet vermutlich ein, zwei Zyklen lang überleben, vielleicht sogar drei.
- Es hat schon bessere Männer als mich zerschlissen. Welchen Sinn hat es überhaupt, wenn Eure Gehirne zu Brei verkommen? Vielleicht reiße ich mir die Augen heraus, wie Amos es getan hat. Bestenfalls werde ich einfach verrückt wie dieser kleine Scheißkerl, der immer unseren Lho gestohlen hat ...
- Oh? Was ist denn mit ihm geschehen?
- Er hat sich aus einer Druckkammer geworfen, weil es ihm irgendwelche Stimmen befohlen haben.
- Also gut. Hüter Felek sagte, der Truppe werde dem Kind nicht lange dienen müssen. Er hat uns sogar ein wenig Spielraum gegeben.
- Im Gegensatz zu diesem fischäugigen ...
- Ruhe! Er könnte Euch hören.
- Nun ja, Ihr wisst, was ich meine. Er hätte uns fast die Köpfe eingeschlagen, weil jemand vergessen hat, die Catering-Einheit zu überprüfen.
- Wir haben seit über zehn Jahren keinen einzigen Außenseiter eingelassen, doch Hüter Theobald findet immer wieder Grund zur Klage. Stellt Euch nur sein Geschrei vor, wenn er erfährt, dass Meister Felek uns nach Lord Winterzunders letztem Besuch den Hänger nicht hat inspizieren lassen.
- Der Thron bewahre! Ich versuche, mich von den Streitigkeiten unter den Hochwohlgeborenen fernzuhalten. Manche von Hüter Feleks Befehlen sind wenig sinnvoll. Beispielsweise, als er das letzte Mal befohlen hat, die Kommunikation mit Rykad Minoris einige Zyklen lang einzustellen.
- Warum sollte er das tun?
- Er war der Besuche des Winterzunder-Sprösslings wohl überdrüssig.
- Nun, es ist immer eine Freude, Meister Felek zu helfen.
- Wohl wahr. Sollen sich die Hochwohlgeborenen damit herumschlagen, wer wen leid ist ..."

languages.text:
« – ... un immense honneur !
– Oui, mais... cette promotion transférera l'escouade tout entière dans la garde personnelle de l'Enfant.
– Par l'Empereur-Dieu ! Ma foi, tu es bien bâti, mon garçon ; tu tiendras bien quelques cycles.
– Des hommes bien plus forts que moi n'y ont pas survécu. Et puis, à quoi bon, si c'est pour avoir le cerveau réduit en bouillie ? Je pourrais peut-être m'arracher les yeux, comme Amos... Avec un peu de chance, je deviendrai juste cinglé, comme ce petit con qui n'arrêtait pas de piquer notre lho...
– Ah oui ? Et qu'est-ce qu'il est devenu ?
– Il s'est éjecté par un sas dépressurisé parce que des voix lui avaient dit de le faire.
– Pas de panique. Le gardien Felek a promis que l'escouade n'aurait pas à servir l'Enfant trop longtemps. Il nous a même laissé une petite marge de manœuvre.
– Pas comme l'autre, avec son regard de poisson...
– Tais-toi ! Il risque de t'entendre.
– Oui, bon, tu vois ce que je veux dire. Il a bien failli nous casser la tête parce que quelqu'un avait oublié de vérifier le réfectoire.
– Ça fait plus de dix ans qu'on n'a plus laissé entrer un étranger, mais le gardien Théobald insiste pour trouver de quoi râler. Imagine les hurlements s'il apprend que le gardien Felek ne nous a pas envoyés inspecter le hangar après la dernière visite du seigneur Winterscale.
– Que le Trône nous en préserve ! J'essaie de me tenir le plus loin possible des querelles des aristos. Certains des ordres du gardien Felek n'ont aucun sens, comme quand il nous a demandé de couper temporairement les communications avec Rykad Minoris.
– Qu'est-ce qui lui a pris ?
– Je crois qu'il en a eu assez des visites du fils Winterscale.
– Eh ben, c'est toujours un plaisir de venir en aide au gardien Felek.
– Tu l'as dit. Si les aristos en ont assez les uns des autres, laissons-les se débrouiller entre eux... »
languages.original_text:
"- ...tremendous honour!
- Yes, but... this promotion will transfer the entire squad to the Child's personal guard.
- By the God-Emperor! Well, you are a strapping lad, you will probably make it for a cycle or three.
- It has worn down better men than me. What even is the point if your brains turn into mush? I may rip out my eyes like Amos did. At best, I'll just go bonkers like that little shit stain that kept stealing our lho...
- Oh? What happened to that one?
- Threw himself out of a depressurised chamber because some voices told him to.
- Calm down. Keeper Felek said the squad will not have to serve the Child for long. He even gave us a little leeway.
- Unlike that fish-eyed...
- Be quiet! He might hear you.
- Well, you know what I mean. He almost busted our heads because someone forgot to check the catering unit.
- We haven't let in a single outsider in over ten years, but Keeper Theobald keeps finding things to fret over. Imagine the shrieking if he finds out Keeper Felek didn't make us inspect the hangar after Lord Winterscale's most recent visit.
- Throne forbid! I try to steer clear of the squabbles among the highborn. Some of Keeper Felek's orders make little sense, like the last time he commanded that we cut off communications with Rykad Minoris for a while.
- Why would he do that?
- It looks like he grew tired of the Winterscale scion's visits.
- Well, it's always a pleasure to aid Keeper Felek.
- That's right. If the highborn have grown tired of each other, let them deal with it..."

languages.text:
“- ……莫大的荣耀！
- 确实如此，可是……这次晋升之后，整支小队都会成为圣子的私人卫队。
- 神皇在上啊！呃，你是个结实的小伙子，大概能撑上一到三个周期吧。
- 比我更厉害的人都被折磨死了。如果你的脑子变成了浆糊，就算身体再结实又能怎么样？说不定我会像阿莫斯那样，把眼睛挖出来，这恐怕已经算是最好的结果了。说不定我会发疯，变得像那个总偷咱们麻烟的小王八蛋一样……
- 哦？那个混蛋怎么样了？
- 他把自己从气闸里扔出去了，因为有‘某个声音’让他这么做。
- 别担心，费雷克大人说我们的小队不会为圣子服务太久，他甚至允许我们偶尔稍微开点小差。
- 他可不像那个鱼眼睛……
- 小点声！他说不定会听到。
- 呃，反正你明白我是什么意思。之前因为有人忘记检查餐饮区域，他差点把咱们所有人的脑袋都打爆。
- 咱们已经十几年都没有让外人进来过了，可西奥巴德大人一直都在找麻烦。想象一下，如果他发现，温特斯凯尔大人最近一次来访之后，费雷克大人并没有让我们检查机库，他会气成什么样子？
- 黄金王座在上，千万别让他发现！我会尽量离那些贵族之间的破事远点。费雷克大人有些命令根本不知道是怎么回事。比如说上次，他下令切断与小莱卡德的通讯，说过一阵子之后再恢复。
- 他为什么要下这种命令？
- 看来，他已经厌倦了温特斯凯尔家族的那个孩子。
- 不管怎么说，给费雷克大人办事总归是件好事。
- 没错，就算那些贵族互相看着不顺眼，那也是他们自己的事情……”
languages.original_text:
"- ...tremendous honour!
- Yes, but... this promotion will transfer the entire squad to the Child's personal guard.
- By the God-Emperor! Well, you are a strapping lad, you will probably make it for a cycle or three.
- It has worn down better men than me. What even is the point if your brains turn into mush? I may rip out my eyes like Amos did. At best, I'll just go bonkers like that little shit stain that kept stealing our lho...
- Oh? What happened to that one?
- Threw himself out of a depressurised chamber because some voices told him to.
- Calm down. Keeper Felek said the squad will not have to serve the Child for long. He even gave us a little leeway.
- Unlike that fish-eyed...
- Be quiet! He might hear you.
- Well, you know what I mean. He almost busted our heads because someone forgot to check the catering unit.
- We haven't let in a single outsider in over ten years, but Keeper Theobald keeps finding things to fret over. Imagine the shrieking if he finds out Keeper Felek didn't make us inspect the hangar after Lord Winterscale's most recent visit.
- Throne forbid! I try to steer clear of the squabbles among the highborn. Some of Keeper Felek's orders make little sense, like the last time he commanded that we cut off communications with Rykad Minoris for a while.
- Why would he do that?

- That's right. If the highborn have grown tired of each other, let them deal with it..."

traits.locale_text:
“- ……莫大的荣耀！
- 确实如此，可是……这次晋升之后，整支小队都会成为圣子的私人卫队。
- 神皇在上啊！呃，你是个结实的小伙子，大概能撑上一到三个周期吧。
- 比我更厉害的人都被折磨死了。如果你的脑子变成了浆糊，就算身体再结实又能怎么样？说不定我会像阿莫斯那样，把眼睛挖出来，这恐怕已经算是最好的结果了。说不定我会发疯，变得像那个总偷咱们麻烟的小王八蛋一样……
- 哦？那个混蛋怎么样了？
- 他把自己从气闸里扔出去了，因为有‘某个声音’让他这么做。
- 别担心，费雷克大人说我们的小队不会为圣子服务太久，他甚至允许我们偶尔稍微开点小差。
- 他可不像那个鱼眼睛……
- 小点声！他说不定会听到。
- 呃，反正你明白我是什么意思。之前因为有人忘记检查餐饮区域，他差点把咱们所有人的脑袋都打爆。
- 咱们已经十几年都没有让外人进来过了，可西奥巴德大人一直都在找麻烦。想象一下，如果他发现，温特斯凯尔大人最近一次来访之后，费雷克大人并没有让我们检查机库，他会气成什么样子？
- 黄金王座在上，千万别让他发现！我会尽量离那些贵族之间的破事远点。费雷克大人有些命令根本不知道是怎么回事。比如说上次，他下令切断与小莱卡德的通讯，说过几个周期之后再恢复。
- 他为什么要下这种命令？
- 看来，他已经厌倦了温特斯凯尔家族的那个孩子。
- 不管怎么说，给费雷克大人办事总归是件好事。
- 没错，至于那些贵族谁看谁不顺眼，就让他们自己处理去吧……”

languages.text:
「- …実に光栄な話だ！
- あぁ、だけど…今回の昇進で、部隊全体が御子付きの護衛に配属替えになる。
- 神帝陛下万歳！まあ、お前は丈夫な奴だから、数サイクルは行けるだろう。
- 俺より優秀な奴らが敵わなかったんだ。脳がドロドロに溶けたら、一体どうする？アモスのように目をくり抜くかもしれない。せいぜい、俺達のアイホを盗み続けたあのクソバカみたいに、頭がおかしくなっていくんだ…
- なんだ？あのバカがどうなったって？
- どっかから聞こえた声に言われて、減圧室から身を投げたんだと。
- 落ち着け。保持者フェレック様の話だと、部隊は長く御子に仕える必要はないらしい。あの人は俺たちに裁量を与えてくれるんだよな。
- あの魚目とは大違い…
- しっ！聞かれてるかもしれないぞ。
- まっ、言いたいことは分かるだろう。誰かが配膳ユニットの確認を忘れて、奴に頭を殴られそうになったんだぜ。
- ここ10年以上、ひとりも部外者を中に入れてないのに、保持者シオボールド様は何かにつけ問題を見つけ出す。ウィンタースケール様が直近で訪問された後、フェレック様が俺達にハンガーを検査させてないと知れば、アイツは悲鳴をあげるぜ。
- 王座のご加護を！ハイボーンの争いごとには関わらない事にしてるんだ。フェレック様の命令には意味がないものもある。前回は、数サイクルの間ライカド・ミノリスとの通信を遮断しろと言われたし。
- どうしてそんな命令を？
- ウィンタースケールの後継者の訪問に飽きているんだろう。
- まあ、フェレック様を助けられるならいつでも歓迎だ。
- あぁ。誰が誰に疲れたとか、ハイボーン同士がお互いに嫌気がさしたのなら、お互いでどうにかすればいい…」
languages.original_text:
"- ...tremendous honour!
- Yes, but... this promotion will transfer the entire squad to the Child's personal guard.
- By the God-Emperor! Well, you are a strapping lad, you will probably make it for a cycle or three.
- It has worn down better men than me. What even is the point if your brains turn into mush? I may rip out my eyes like Amos did. At best, I'll just go bonkers like that little shit stain that kept stealing our lho...
- Oh? What happened to that one?
- Threw himself out of a depressurised chamber because some voices told him to.
- Calm down. Keeper Felek said the squad will not have to serve the Child for long. He even gave us a little leeway.
- Unlike that fish-eyed...
- Be quiet! He might hear you.
- Well, you know what I mean. He almost busted our heads because someone forgot to check the catering unit.
- We haven't let in a single outsider in over ten years, but Keeper Theobald keeps finding things to fret over. Imagine the shrieking if he finds out Keeper Felek didn't make us inspect the hangar after Lord Winterscale's most recent visit.
- Throne forbid! I try to steer clear of the squabbles among the highborn. Some of Keeper Felek's orders make little sense, like the last time he commanded that we cut off communications with Rykad Minoris for a while.
- Why would he do that?
- It looks like he grew tired of the Winterscale scion's visits.
- Well, it's always a pleasure to aid Keeper Felek.
- That's right. If the highborn have grown tired of each other, let them deal with it..."

traits.locale_text:
「- …実に光栄な話だ！
- あぁ、だけど…今回の昇進で、部隊全体が御子付きの兵士に配属替えになる。
- 神帝陛下万歳！まあ、お前は丈夫な奴だから、1～3サイクルで慣れるだろう。
- 俺より優秀な奴らが敵わなかったんだ。脳がドロドロに溶けたら、一体どうする？アモスのように目をくり抜くかもしれない。せいぜい、俺達のアイホを盗み続けたあのクソバカみたいに、頭がおかしくなっていくんだ…
- なんだ？あのバカがどうなったって？
- どっかから聞こえた声に言われて、減圧室から身を投げたんだと。
- そうかい。フェレック管理長の話だと、部隊は長く御子に仕える必要はないらしい。あの人は心のゆとりまでくれるんだよな。
- あの魚目とは大違い…
- しっ！聞かれてるかもしれないぞ。
- まっ、言いたいことは分かるだろう。誰かが配膳ユニットの確認を忘れて、奴に頭を殴られそうになったんだ。
- ここ10年以上、ひとりも部外者を中に入れてないのに、テオバルド管理長は心配事をずっと探している。想像してみろ、ウィンタースケール様が直近で訪問された後、フェレック管理長が俺達にハンガーを検査させてないと知れば、アイツは悲鳴をあげるぜ。
- 王座が許さない！ハイボーンの争いごとには関わらない事にしてるんだ。フェレック管理長の命令には意味がないものもある。前回は、数サイクルの間ライカド・ミノリスとの通信を遮断しろと言われたし。
- どうしてそんな命令を？
- ウィンタースケールの後継者の訪問に疲れているんだろう。
- そうだな、フェレック管理長を助けられるならいつでも歓迎だ。
- あぁ。誰が誰に疲れたとか、ハイボーンの好きにさせよう…」

「- …実に光栄な話だ！
- あぁ、だけど…今回の昇進で、部隊全体が御子付きの護衛に配属替えになる。
- 神帝陛下万歳！まあ、お前は丈夫な奴だから、数サイクルは行けるだろう。

- 王座のご加護を！ハイボーンの争いごとには関わらない事にしてるんだ。フェレック様の命令には意味がないものもある。前回は、数サイクルの間ライカド・ミノリスとの通信を遮断しろと言われたし。
- どうしてそんな命令を？
- ウィンタースケールの後継者の訪問に飽きているんだろう。
- まあ、フェレック様を助けられるならいつでも歓迎だ。
- あぁ。誰が誰に疲れたとか、ハイボーン同士がお互いに嫌気がさしたのなら、お互いでどうにかすればいい…」

languages.text:
"-...Muazzam bir onur!
- Evet ama... Bu terfi, tüm mangayı Çocuk'un hususi korumalığına atayacak.
- Tanrı İmparator aşkına! Dalyan gibi delikanlısın, birkaç döngü idare edersin herhâlde.
- Benden daha iyileri dayanamadı. Beynim lapaya döndükten sonra ne fark eder ki? Amos gibi gözlerimi oyarım artık. En iyi ihtimalle, lihomuzu çalıp duran o küçük şerefsiz gibi balatayı sıyırırım.
- Deme ya. Ne oldu ki ona?
- Gaipten bir ses dedi diye kendini basınçsız odadan dışarı attı.
- Sakin ol. Sorumlu Felek, manganın Çocuk'a uzun süre hizmet etmesi gerekmeyeceğini söyledi. Bize biraz kıyak bile yaptı.
- O balık gözlü şeref...
- Şşşt! Yerin kulağı var.
- Neyse ne, biliyorsun işte. Yemekhaneyi kontrol etmeyi unuttular diye neredeyse kafamızı kıracaktı.
- On yıldan uzun süredir tek bir yabancıyı içeri almadık ama Sorumlu Theobald illaki dert edecek bir şey buluyor. Lord Winterscale'in son ziyaretinden sonra Sorumlu Felek'in bize askıyı denetletmediğini öğrense nasıl feryat figan bağırırdı bir hayal et.
- Taht muhafaza! Soylular arasındaki çekişmeler bana uzak olsun. Gerçi Sorumlu Felek'in bazı emirleri de pek akıl alır değildi. Misal Rykad Minoris ile iletişimi bir süreliğine kesmemizi istemesi.
- Sahi, niye öyle bir şey yaptı?
- Winterscale vârisinin ziyaretlerinden bıkmış herhâlde.
- Neyse, Sorumlu Felek'e yardım etmek iyi oluyor.
- Öyle, öyle. Madem boylular birbirlerinden usandı, bırak didişsinler."
languages.original_text:
"- ...tremendous honour!
- Yes, but... this promotion will transfer the entire squad to the Child's personal guard.
- By the God-Emperor! Well, you are a strapping lad, you will probably make it for a cycle or three.
- It has worn down better men than me. What even is the point if your brains turn into mush? I may rip out my eyes like Amos did. At best, I'll just go bonkers like that little shit stain that kept stealing our lho...
- Oh? What happened to that one?
- Threw himself out of a depressurised chamber because some voices told him to.
- Calm down. Keeper Felek said the squad will not have to serve the Child for long. He even gave us a little leeway.
- Unlike that fish-eyed...
- Be quiet! He might hear you.
- Well, you know what I mean. He almost busted our heads because someone forgot to check the catering unit.
- We haven't let in a single outsider in over ten years, but Keeper Theobald keeps finding things to fret over. Imagine the shrieking if he finds out Keeper Felek didn't make us inspect the hangar after Lord Winterscale's most recent visit.
- Throne forbid! I try to steer clear of the squabbles among the highborn. Some of Keeper Felek's orders make little sense, like the last time he commanded that we cut off communications with Rykad Minoris for a while.
- Why would he do that?
- It looks like he grew tired of the Winterscale scion's visits.
- Well, it's always a pleasure to aid Keeper Felek.
- That's right. If the highborn have grown tired of each other, let them deal with it..."

traits.locale_text:
"-...muazzam bir onur!
- Evet ama... Bu terfi, tüm mangayı Çocuk'un hususi korumalığına atayacak.
- Tanrı İmparator aşkına! Dalyan gibi delikanlısın, birkaç döngü idare edersin herhâlde.
- Benden daha iyileri dayanamadı. Beynim lapaya döndükten sonra ne fark eder ki? Amos gibi gözlerimi oyarım artık. En iyi ihtimalle, lihomuzu çalıp duran o küçük şerefsiz gibi balatayı sıyırırım.
- Deme ya. Ne oldu ki ona?
- Gaipten bir ses dedi diye kendini basınçsız odadan dışarı attı.
- Sakin ol. Sorumlu Felek, manganın Çocuk'a uzun süre hizmet etmesi gerekmeyeceğini söyledi. Bize biraz kıyak bile yaptı.
- O balık gözlü şeref...
- Şşşt! Yerin kulağı var.
- Neyse ne, biliyorsun işte. Yemekhaneyi kontrol etmeyi unuttular diye neredeyse kafamızı kıracaktı.
- On yıldan uzun süredir tek bir yabancıyı içeri almadık ama Sorumlu Theobald illa ki dert edecek bir şey buluyor. Lord Winterscale'in son ziyaretinden sonra Sorumlu Felek'in bize askıyı denetletmediğini öğrense nasıl feryat figan bağırırdı bir hayal et.
- Taht muhafaza! Soylular arasındaki çekişmeler bana uzak olsun. Gerçi Sorumlu Felek'in bazı emirleri de pek akıl alır değildi. Misal Rykad Minoris ile iletişimi bir süreliğine kesmemizi istemesi.
- Sahi, niye öyle bir şey yaptı?
- Winterscale vârisinin ziyaretlerinden bıkmış herhâlde.
- Neyse, Sorumlu Felek'e yardım etmek iyi oluyor.
- Öyle, öyle. Madem boylular birbirlerinden usandı, bırak didişsinler."
